name: Google Cloud CLI
description: Installs the Google Cloud CLI (gcloud) for managing Google Cloud resources

version.description: Version of the Google Cloud CLI to install. Use 'latest' for the most recent version.

installComponents.description: Space-separated list of package names to install. Use 'base' for gcloud CLI only, or specify actual package names like 'kubectl', 'google-cloud-cli-app-engine-python', etc.
